title: Strengthening Deep Learning Competencies: Blended Research-Based Instructional Design for Online Learning Experience Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online learning tools and intermediate-level job expertise
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three technical design elements that promote effective interaction in online learning environments.
Learners can perform procedures to analyze online learning satisfaction using mixed research methodologies (surveys and focus groups).
Learners can propose at least two strategies to enhance social comfort in VR/simulation-based instructional design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
